heat-demand-total.title: P1.1 Total heat demand
heat-demand-total.format: function(v,u){ if(v>1e6){ v /= 1e6; u = 'TWh'; } if(v>1e3){ v /= 1e3; u = 'MWh'; } if(v==0){ return '0'; } if(typeof this.parameters[param].dp==='number'){ v = parseFloat(v.toFixed(this.parameters[param].dp)); } return v.toLocaleString()+u; }
heat-demand-total.description: Heat demand in kWh of all buildings, including new build.

heat-demand.title: P1.2 Heat demand
heat-demand.format: function(v,u){ if(v>1e6){ v /= 1e6; u = 'TWh'; } if(v>1e3){ v /= 1e3; u = 'MWh'; } if(v==0){ return '0'; } if(typeof this.parameters[param].dp==='number'){ v = parseFloat(v.toFixed(this.parameters[param].dp)); } return v.toLocaleString()+u; }
heat-demand.description: Heat demand in kWh of all buildings existing in 2020 in each LSOA. New builds and other changes to non-domestic footprint over time are excluded here to isolate the effect the energy efficiency.

electricity-demand-heat.title: P1.3 Electricity demand for heat
electricity-demand-heat.format: function(v,u){ if(v>1e6){ v /= 1e6; u = 'TWh'; } if(v>1e3){ v /= 1e3; u = 'MWh'; } if(v==0){ return '0'; } if(typeof this.parameters[param].dp==='number'){ v = parseFloat(v.toFixed(this.parameters[param].dp)); } return v.toLocaleString()+u; }
electricity-demand-heat.description: Electricity demand for space and hot water heating by LSOA, including new builds and district heating

domestic-new-build.title: P2.5 Domestic new build projections
domestic-new-build.description: Cumulative number of domestic new builds per year.

fuelbill-all-0-500.title: P3.1 All stock - fuel bill band £0-500
fuelbill-all-0-500.description: Average fraction of households in fuel bill band £0-500. Includes both the fuel poor and non-fuel poor stock. New builds and stock on district heating are excluded from this analysis. Fuel bills include only heating, not electricity use for lighting and appliances.

fuelbill-all-500-1000.title: P3.1 All stock - fuel bill band £500-1000
fuelbill-all-500-1000.description: Average fraction of households in fuel bill band £500-1000. Includes both the fuel poor and non-fuel poor stock. New builds and stock on district heating are excluded from this analysis. Fuel bills include only heating, not electricity use for lighting and appliances.

fuelbill-all-1000-1500.title: P3.1 All stock - fuel bill band £1000-1500
fuelbill-all-1000-1500.description: Average fraction of households in fuel bill band £1000-1500. Includes both the fuel poor and non-fuel poor stock. New builds and stock on district heating are excluded from this analysis. Fuel bills include only heating, not electricity use for lighting and appliances.

fuelbill-all-1500-2000.title: P3.1 All stock - fuel bill band £1500-2000
fuelbill-all-1500-2000.description: Average fraction of households in fuel bill band £1500-2000. Includes both the fuel poor and non-fuel poor stock. New builds and stock on district heating are excluded from this analysis. Fuel bills include only heating, not electricity use for lighting and appliances.

fuelbill-all-2000.title: P3.1 All stock - fuel bill band >£2000
fuelbill-all-2000.description: Average fraction of households in fuel bill band >£2000. Includes both the fuel poor and non-fuel poor stock. New builds and stock on district heating are excluded from this analysis. Fuel bills include only heating, not electricity use for lighting and appliances.

fuelbill-poor-0-500.title: P3.1 Fuel poor - fuel bill band £0-500
fuelbill-poor-0-500.description: Average fraction of (initially) fuel poor households in fuel bill band £0-500. The 'Fuel poor stock' is defind as those households initially fuel poor. As fuel costs shift over time for particular achetypes in reality households would move in and out of fuel poverty. However, to track impacts of the scenarios on fuel poor households we make the simplifying assumption that the households labelled 'fuel poor' remain fixed over time. New builds and stock on district heating are excluded from this analysis. Fuel bills include only heating, not electricity use for lighting and appliances.

fuelbill-poor-500-1000.title: P3.1 Fuel poor - fuel bill band £500-1000
fuelbill-poor-500-1000.description: Average fraction of initially fuel poor households in fuel bill band £500-1000. The 'Fuel poor stock' is defind as those households initially fuel poor. As fuel costs shift over time for particular achetypes in reality households would move in and out of fuel poverty. However, to track impacts of the scenarios on fuel poor households we make the simplifying assumption that the households labelled 'fuel poor' remain fixed over time. New builds and stock on district heating are excluded from this analysis. Fuel bills include only heating, not electricity use for lighting and appliances.

fuelbill-poor-1000-1500.title: P3.1 Fuel poor - fuel bill band £1000-1500
fuelbill-poor-1000-1500.description: Average fraction of initially fuel poor households in fuel bill band £1000-1500. The 'Fuel poor stock' is defind as those households initially fuel poor. As fuel costs shift over time for particular achetypes in reality households would move in and out of fuel poverty. However, to track impacts of the scenarios on fuel poor households we make the simplifying assumption that the households labelled 'fuel poor' remain fixed over time. New builds and stock on district heating are excluded from this analysis. Fuel bills include only heating, not electricity use for lighting and appliances.

fuelbill-poor-1500-2000.title: P3.1 Fuel poor - fuel bill band £1500-2000
fuelbill-poor-1500-2000.description: Average fraction of initially fuel poor households in fuel bill band £1500-2000. The 'Fuel poor stock' is defind as those households initially fuel poor. As fuel costs shift over time for particular achetypes in reality households would move in and out of fuel poverty. However, to track impacts of the scenarios on fuel poor households we make the simplifying assumption that the households labelled 'fuel poor' remain fixed over time. New builds and stock on district heating are excluded from this analysis. Fuel bills include only heating, not electricity use for lighting and appliances.

fuelbill-poor-2000.title: P3.1 Fuel poor - fuel bill band >£2000
fuelbill-poor-2000.description: Average fraction of initially fuel poor households in fuel bill band >£2000. The 'Fuel poor stock' is defind as those households initially fuel poor. As fuel costs shift over time for particular achetypes in reality households would move in and out of fuel poverty. However, to track impacts of the scenarios on fuel poor households we make the simplifying assumption that the households labelled 'fuel poor' remain fixed over time. New builds and stock on district heating are excluded from this analysis. Fuel bills include only heating, not electricity use for lighting and appliances.

co2emissions-domestic.title: P4.1 CO2 emissions - domestic
co2emissions-domestic.description: Sum of greenhouse gas emissions from existing domestic (excl. district heating) space heat and hot water measured in kilotonnes of carbon dioxide equivalent (kg CO2)

co2emissions-nondomestic.title: P4.1 CO2 emissions - non-domestic
co2emissions-nondomestic.description: Sum of greenhouse gas emissions from existing non-domestic space heat and hot water measured in kilotonnes of carbon dioxide equivalent (kg CO2)

co2emissions-districtheating.title: P4.1 CO2 emissions - district heating
co2emissions-districtheating.description: Sum of greenhouse gas emissions from district heating (domestic only) measured in kilotonnes of carbon dioxide equivalent (kg CO2)

co2emissions-newbuild.title: P4.1 CO2 emissions - new build
co2emissions-newbuild.description: Sum of greenhouse gas emissions from new build (domestic only) measured in kilotonnes of carbon dioxide equivalent (kg CO2)

co2emissions-total.title: P4.1 CO2 emissions - total
co2emissions-total.description: Sum of greenhouse gas emissions total measured in kilotonnes of carbon dioxide equivalent (kg CO2)

lchuptake-directelectric.title: P4.2 LCH uptake - direct electric
lchuptake-directelectric.description: Sum of uptake of direct electric in units deployed.

lchuptake-districtheating.title: P4.2 LCH uptake - district heating
lchuptake-districtheating.description: Sum of uptake of district heating measured in number of homes connected.

lchuptake-heatpumps.title: P4.2 LCH uptake - heat pumps
lchuptake-heatpumps.description: Sum of uptake of both air-source and ground-source heat pumps in units deployed.

lchuptake-hybridhp.title: P4.2 LCH uptake - hybrid heat pumps
lchuptake-hybridhp.description: Sum of updake of heat pumps operating in conjunction with a secondary heating technology in units deployed. This category is made up of mostly heat pumps with bioenergy, deployed in off-gas grid properties, but also includes a small fraction of heat pumps with hydrogen boilers (except in the Consumer Transformation scenario), and heat pumps with electric resistive heating.

lchuptake-hydrogen.title: P4.2 LCH uptake - hydrogen
lchuptake-hydrogen.description: Sum of uptake of hydrogen in units deployed.

lchuptake-total.title: P4.2 LCH uptake - total
lchuptake-total.description: Sum of uptake of all low carbon heating technologies measured in total homes.
